verses.1: Migilote eng kei inla, amaute tawh kikhawl kei in.
verses.2: Amaute in tatsiat ding bek ngaihsun uh a, thusia bekbek genin nei uh hi.
verses.3: Pilna tawh inn kilam a, ngaihsut siamna tawh inn kip hi.
verses.4: Thungaihsut theihna inn sungah a hoih a manpha nate a dimtakin om hi.
verses.5: Thahatna sangin pilna hoih zaw a, thakhauhna sangin thutheihna hoih zaw hi.
verses.6: Geel siamna tawh galte kizo a, ngaihsut siamna tawh gualzawhna kingah hi.
verses.7: Pil kampauna pen mihaiteʼ theih zawh dingin thuk lua mahmah a, mihaite in mihon lakah thu gen ngam lo uh hi.
verses.8: Thusia lamsang a deih mite thusia bawl mi kici hi.
verses.9: Mihaiteʼ vaihawmna in khialhna bek piangsak lel a, mi a simmawh theite midangte in mudah uh hi.
verses.10: Haksatna na tuah ciangin na lung a kiat leh a gina lo mi na hi hi.
verses.11: Thah dinga a kikai khia mipa hon khia inla, sih nading mun a zuan mipa lehkaihkik in.
verses.12: Keʼn thei kha kei ing, na cih nop hangin lungsim a thei Pasian in thei tel veve hi; nang hong encik Pasian in hong tel theihna phawk in. Mi khempeuh a gamtatna bangin a thukkik ding hi.
verses.13: Ka ta aw, khuaizu khum ahih manin ne in. I kam ah khuailuzu khum mahmah hi.
verses.14: Pilna pen i nuntakna ah khuaizu tawh kibang a, pilna nei lecin mai lamah lametna om a, na khan hong sausak ding hi.
verses.15: Migiloteʼ gamtat bangin thuman miteʼ omna su gawp kei inla, amauʼ teenna inn luh gawp kei in.
verses.16: Mihoihte sagih vei dong a puk hangin tho kikkik thei a, migilote ahihleh tuahsiatna thuakin kithallot hi.
verses.17: Na galte in gimna a ngah ciangin lungdam kei inla, a puk ciangin kipak kei in.
verses.18: Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in hong thei-in nang tungah lungkim lo dinga, na galte tungah heh nawn loin gim pia lo kha ding hi.
verses.19: Migiloteʼ hangin lung nuammawh kei inla, amaute eng kei in.
verses.20: Amaute in mai lamah lamet ding bangmah nei lo a, amauteʼ meivak kisukmitsak ding hi.
verses.21: Ka ta aw, Topa le kumpipa zahtak khawm inla, amau a langpangte tawh kipawl kha kei in.
verses.22: Tua bang mite thakhat thu-in kisu gawp thei ding hi. Pasian le kumpipaʼ piansak theih ding gimna kuamah in gen khol thei lo hi.
verses.23: Mipil dangte in zong hih bangin thu gen uh hi: Mi lang muhin thukhenna hoih lo hi.
verses.24: Mimawh kimlai a diksak thukhen pa leitung a mi khempeuh in mudahin phuisam ding hi.
verses.25: A mawh mi gim a pia thukhen pa ahihleh thupha kipia-in daupai ding hi.
verses.26: A mantakin dawnkikna pen lawm taktak hihna lim ahi hi.
verses.27: Na nuntak nading zong masa inla, na annek ding a kicin ciang bekin na inn ding lamin zi le ta nei pan in.
verses.28: Thu kician om lopi-in na veengpaʼ lang khat ah teci pang kei inla, amauʼ siat nadingin zuau thu gen kei in.
verses.29: Kei tungah hong bawl bangin kei zong ka bawl dinga, ama hong hihna bangin ka thuk ding hi, ci kha kei in.
verses.30: Mi thadahpaʼ lo gei ah ka va pai a, mihai paʼ leenggui lo ka va nawk kha hi.
verses.31: Limtakin ka et ciangin a lo ciing bupah kiak dim a, a leitang khempeuh lopa in khuhcip a, a umna a phungcian suangte kicim khin hi.
verses.32: Tua bang ka muh ciangin thu ka lung ngaingai a, thu manpha khat ka mu khia hi.
verses.33: Tawmvei ihmutna, tawmvei lusukna, tawmvei sung na sep lohna, khut zepin om mawkna hangin
verses.34: i tungah zawnna hong tung a, cihmawhna in hong khuhcip hi.
